title: Werewolves: A Collection of Original Stories
description: A collection of fifteen stories by a variety of authors about the sometimes frightening, sometimes humorous, phenomena of werewolves.ContentsIntroduction: How to Become a WerewolfBad Blood by Debra Doyle & J.D. MacdonaldThe Werewolf's Gift by Ru EmersonThe White Wolf by Leigh Ann HusseyNot All Wolves by Harry TurtledoveWolfskin by Mary K. WhittingtonNight Calls by Katharine Eliska KimbrielWolf From the Door by Elizabeth ScarboroughMonster Mash by Sherwood SmithThe Passing of the Pack by Bruce CovilleFlesh and Blood by Marguerite W. DavolGreen Messiah by Jane YolemThe Wolf's Flock by Susan ShwartzMet By Moonlight by Anne E. CromptonA Winter's Night by Esther M. FriesnerOne Chance by Charles de Lint
author: Jane Yolen
